#	unknown-#-party	unknown-#-dob	unknown-#-constituency	speech	unkown-language	2021-11-17 00:00:00	Inflation: Discussion (Resumed)	47	The Chair is referring to those in the middle four deciles slightly losing out due to budget 2022 compared with price index policies.
